Felicia is a very proactive and hard-working woman.  She sells clothes, and she also has a book store.  She has very good clientele who always buy everything she sells.  This is the way that she is making headway with great effort and struggle.

She is requesting this loan to buy various garments.  This way she will be able to continue with her sales.  She will continue putting forth great effort in order to improve every day and to help her loved ones in this way.

loans.use: to buy various items of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Gunduz

texts.en:
Gunduz is a 27-year-old single man. He never went to school because of his parents' financial situation and the war.  Gunduz is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) and lives with his family in the Bilasuvar region. They are living in hard conditions because of that.  He is working every day without rest .

He has been working growing fruit and vegetables, which he learned from his father. This has allowed him to move his family ahead.  Gunduz's brother has been helping him in this business. He is selling his crops at the bazaar.  He is requesting a loan from Aqroinvest CU to buy seed and manure. His dream in the future is to have own store.  Please support  Gunduz.

loans.use: to buy seed and manure, to grow better fruit and vegetables to sell in the bazaar

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret 41 years old, supports a family of 4 members. 

She has been practicing small scale farming for the last 20 years earning an income of KES14,000. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya to buy fertilizers and seedling for planting.

She plans to use the anticipated profits to educate her children and expand her farming. 

Her future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedling for planting so as to become financially stable

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers to increase soil fertility for better agricultural produce and to meet client and family needs.

loans.name: Huệ

texts.en:
Mrs Huệ works in agriculture farming food.

Huệ is 36 years old and she is married with 2 children.  She lives and works in Dong Son district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Huệ first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.  Huệ has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Huệ faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine.She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Huệ hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet, for the health of her family

loans.name: Priska

texts.en:
Priska is 30 years old, married and blessed with 5 children. She is a farmer and has been in this business for the 5 years now. She also supports 6 family members. 

She will use the loan from Vision Fund Kenya to buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm. She hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce for sell. She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children. Her future hopes are to improve her farming and be successful.

loans.use: To buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm and hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce for sell.

loans.name: Salome

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Salome works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines and earns additional income from pig fattening. Salome is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Salome has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Mamani

texts.en:
Mamani is a 29-year-old housewife who lives in Alipurduar with her husband and three daughters. Two of them are students and the other one is a toddler. She is illiterate but knows how to sign her name.

Her husband keeps himself busy selling "panipuri", a popular street snack, by wandering here and there in a cycle van. In the Bengali language, it is called "phuchka." It consists of a round hollow puri, fried crisp and filled with flavored water. Mamani works hard and manages the household work until night. She prepares "panipuris" at home and her husband sells them to different places in their village. Unfortunately, her husband’s cycle van has been damaged and it is difficult for him to run the business. To continue with this business, Mamani has requested a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase a new cycle van, which will enable her husband to run the business smoothly.

As there is a great demand for her "Phuchkas", Mamani wishes to get ahead with their existing business and make it a profitable one.  She hopes she will be able to expand the business with the profit she will earn and improve her family’s lifestyle.

She is very thankful to BJS and Kiva for their kind support.

loans.use: To purchase a cycle van for her husband's Panipuri-selling business.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es:
Alfredo es de la ciudad de Pilar, se dedica a las ventas variadas, es una persona  muy trabajadora y emprendedora y con muchas ganas de poder salir adelante y mejorar.
Es un señor que se gana la vida de una manera digna y con sacrificio, quiere seguir con su trabajo, y es por eso que pide este préstamo, para poder comprar prendas, calzados y otros artículos para la venta. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar.
texts.en: Alfredo is from the city of Pilar.  He is engaged in the sales of various items.  He is a hardworking, enterprising person with a great desire to be able to get ahead and improve.  He is a man that earns his living in a dignified manner, and with sacrifice.  He wishes to continue with his business, and for this reason, he is requesting this loan to purchase clothing, shoes, and other articles for sale.  He is grateful for this opportunity he is receiving, which will enable him to improve.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, shoes, and other articles for sale.

loans.name: Ramona

texts.es:
Ramona es de la ciudad de Pilar, tiene dos salones que alquila a comerciantes y una vivienda, por medio de los alquileres que tiene, puede tener los medios para poder ayudar a su familia.
Ramona quiere implementar cada día una mejor condición para poder dar a sus inquilinos un mejor servicio.
Pide este préstamo para la refacción de salones y vivienda que tiene la Sra. Ramona, de manera a poder seguir con su meta de dar un mejor servicio cada día.
texts.en:
Ramona is from the city of Pilar. She has two rooms which she rents out to salespeople as well as a home. Through her rental properties, she is able to have the means to help her family.

Ramona would like to implement better conditions to give her tenants a better service. She is applying for a loan to renovate the rooms and her home. She will then be able to continue with her goal of giving better service every day.

loans.use: to renovate her salon and home.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
La Sra. Luz tiene 40 años,  es comerciante tiene casa propia, tiene su propia pizzería que ha montado con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo. Se inició en el rubro hace más de 10  años, por lo que ya es muy conocida.
Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que pone todo de sí para poder mejorar y crecer cada día en el trabajo que viene haciendo. Ella comenta que a la par que trabaja en su pizzería también tiene un trabajo en la función pública.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos al por mayor para su pizzería, como ser harina, verduras, quesos y otros.
texts.en:
Luz, 40, is a saleswoman. She has her own house and her own pizzeria which she set up with plenty of sacrifice and effort. She started this business more than ten years ago, so she is very well-known.

She is a very hardworking person who gives her all to improve and grow every day in her work. She says that alongside her pizzeria, she also has a job in the public sector.

She is applying for a loan to buy wholesale ingredients for her pizzeria, such as flour, vegetables, cheese and others.

loans.use: to buy flour, vegetables, cheese, and other wholesale ingredients for her pizzeria.

loans.name: Konul

texts.en:
Konul is 38 year old, married and she has three kids. Konul is IDP(internally displaced person) and lives with her  family in the Bilasuvar region. Her husband is a driver. But his salary not enough to cover family needs, so because of that she is growing vegetables and fruit in her  small plantation and is earning a living. She has been doing this business for 20 years. 

She is asking for the support of Kiva lenders because she wants to grow a different crop like potatoes this season.  Konul needs a loan of 1500 AZN to buy fertilizer, manure and seeds of the highest quality to plant and therefore diversify the income of her household and to stop depending on bean crops to be able to support the needs of her children and get ahead. This is going to be her 1st loan. Please support her.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure and seeds, to produce potatoes for sale to help her family move ahead

loans.name: Eudelia

texts.es:
Eudelia esta trabajando en su comedor, y por medio de su trabajo se gana la vida de una manera digna y honesta, comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en comprar un congelador para poder mantener mejor sus alimentos, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda.
Comenta que ha ido creciendo bastante, y es por ello que pide nuevamente este préstamo para poder comprar otro congelador, y de esa manera a poder mantener frescos los productos que ofrece a sus clientes. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que recibe que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Eudelia works in her diner. Through her work, she makes a living in a decent and honest way. She says that she used her previous loan to buy a freezer to better maintain her ingredients, which was of great help to her.

She says that she has been growing considerably, which is why she is applying for a loan to buy another freezer. She will then be able to keep the products she offers her clients fresh. She is grateful for this new opportunity, which will help her very much.

loans.use: to buy a freezer for her diner.

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru: Эту ответственную женщину зовут Мухаббат. Мухаббат у 54 года. Она мать троих  прекрасных детей. У нее 2 сыновей, и одна дочка. Сыновьям 32 и 28 лет. Дочке 24 года. Старший сын бизнесмен. Он занимается торговлей на рынке. Младший сын находится на заработках загранице. Мухаббат занимается портнихой у себя дома. Она опытная и талантливая швея. Мухаббат берет заказы на шитье национальной женской одежды. Такой деятельностью она занимается более 8лет. Она очень любить свою работу и хочет заняться еще много лет. Ей в работе нравится результаты, которых, она в процессе добивается. Мухаббат нравится смотреть на восторженные лица своих клиентов, после того как они надевают заказанные платья. Сейчас ее нынешняя швейная машинка устарела, и не успевает шить заказы. И она хочет на деньги от кредита купить новую машинку, чтобы поскорее приступить к работе. Мухаббат ждет Вашу доброту.
texts.en:
This responsible woman is called Muhabbat. Muhabbat is 54 years old. She is the mother of three wonderful children. She has two sons and one daughter. Her sons are 32 and 28 years old. Her elder son is a businessman. He does business in the market. Her younger son lives and works abroad. 

Muhabbat does tailoring from home. She is an experienced and talented seamstress. Muhabbat takes orders for sewing national womens' clothes. She has been working in this business for more than eight years. She loves her work very much and wants to continue doing it for many more years. She loves the results which she obtains during the course of her work. Muhabbat likes to see the enthusiastic faces of her clients after they put on the dresses they ordered. 

Now her current sewing machine has become obsolete, and can no longer make her orders. She wants to buy a new sewing machine with the money from a loan, so that she can start work again sooner. Muhabbat is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Carmelo

texts.es:
Carmelo es de la ciudad de Carapeguá, es docente, y comenta que ahora está estudiando la carrera de  derecho, ya que quiere poder mejorar sus conocimientos y poder de esa forma abrirse camino.
Él es una persona que se esfuerza y que está creciendo. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y así seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en: Carmelo is from Carapeguá city. He is a teacher and states that now he is studying a law career, as he wishes to improve his knowledge and be able to pursue a new career.  He is a person who strives to do his best and is growing academically. He seeks this loan in order to be able to pay the bills for his university studies and in this way continue studying.

loans.use: to pay university expenses.

loans.name: Đoàn

texts.en:
Mr Đoàn works in agriculture farming food.

Đoàn is 45 years old and he is married with 3 children. He lives and works in Dong Son district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Đoàn first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. Đoàn has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
One of the most critical difficulties that concerns his is not having a hygienic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

In the future, Đoàn hopes for his business to do well, for his family to be healthy and happy, and for his children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet for the health and welfare of his family

loans.name: Tuyết

texts.en:
Mrs. Tuyết works in agriculture farming food. She is 34 years old and is married with 2 children. She lives and works in Dong Son district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Tuyết joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. She has successfully repaid 3 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. Tuyết has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Tuyết faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

In the future, Tuyết hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build toilet

loans.name: Luận

texts.en:
Mrs Luận has a service business shipping goods. She is 22 years old and is married with no children.  Luận lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Luận's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She has been involved in this business for 9 years.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

In the future, Luận hopes to build a new house, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build toilet

loans.name: Hải

texts.en:
Mr. Hải operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. He is 33 years old and he is married with 3 children. Hải lives with 3 dependents in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hải's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. Hải has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Hải faces in his life is not having a hygienic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

In the future, Hải hopes for his business to do well, to make enough money to provide for his kids, and for his family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build toilet.

loans.name: Devis

texts.en:
Devis 24 years old, supports 3 members in the family. 

He has been operating a barber shop for the last 4 years earning an income of KES7,000 per month. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy new shaving machines, after shave cream and towels for use.

He plans to use the anticipated profits to educate his children. 

His future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy new shaving machines, after shave cream and towels for use

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To improve her beauty salon and equip it to meet clients' needs and raise more income to meet family demands.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is a married woman with 4 children. She describes herself to be honest. She operates a retail business where she sells vegetables. She has been involved in this business for 6 years. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are individuals. 

She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds. She will use the Kes 40,000 loan to buy more stocks of vegetables. Her business goal is to have a large scale business within 5 years. 

This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.Previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy more stocks of vegetables to be able to grow to a large scale business in the future

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en:
Hannah is a Kiva borrower and has 3 children. She describes herself to be honest. She operates a farm where she keeps dairy cows and also grows crops. She has been involved in this business for 4 years. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are individuals. 

She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of farm inputs. Her business goal is to have a large scale business within 5 years. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: buy more stock of farm inputs so as to grow her business

loans.name: Nhom 12 - Luu Phuong Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Tuoi, 55, is a single mom with one child still in school. She has been an active member of the Women's Union since 1995. Her family is a poor family. Currently they don't have a hygienic toilet yet. However, her local women's union has recently started a campaign to improve sanitation and hygiene. With this loan, she will have a hygienic toilet installed in her home. This will improve the health of her family members and contribute to environmental protection. In the picture, Tuoi is the first person from the left.

With the help of the local Women Union in this campaign, Thrive Network can ensure the repayment rate up to 99%.

loans.use: To pay for the construction of a sanitary latrine with a device for hand-washing with soap

loans.name: Aleko

texts.en:
Aleko is 42-year-old married man from a small village in Tkibuli district. He lives with his pensioner parents, wife and two school-aged children. Aleko is an electrician and generates income according to his orders. The main source of income for the family is from agricultural activities. In particular, they have a plot of agricultural land, which is cultivated seasonally to grow vegetables there. In addition, they have a cow and three calves and produce dairy products. 

Aleko decided to expand his agricultural activities and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of 2,300 USD. With the received credit, he will purchase beehives with bee colonies and will start producing honey to sell locally. Aleko will generate more profit after the Start Up and will be able to improve the living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to purchase beehives with bee colonies and produce honey to sell

loans.name: Inmaculada Group

texts.es:
El grupo “Inmaculada” está en su 3º ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas se comprometieron a trabajar y a ayudarse entre todas para salir adelante. Están además dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Zonia, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir están en una pobreza extrema, que quiere mejorar por medio de las capacitaciones y de su esfuerzo. Zonia se dedica a bordar zapatillas, que ella misma hace, tiene buena venta, ya que sus productos son muy aceptados.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar zapatillas, pinzas, lentejuelas, agujas, alicates y otros, agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia por medio de su trabajo.
texts.en:
The “Inmaculada” [Immaculate] group is in its third cycle of a women’s committee program, which is committed to working and helping each other succeed. They are also part of a program to eliminate poverty.   

One of the members is Mrs. Zonia, who in her survey showed an extreme level of poverty. She wants to improve through training and hard work. Zonia makes a living embroidering shoes that she makes herself. She has good sales, as her products are very popular.  

She is asking for this loan in order to buy shoes, tweezers, sequins, sewing needles, pliers and other supplies. She is grateful for this opportunity she has received to be able to improve her and her family’s living conditions through her work.

loans.use: to buy shoes, tweezers, sequins, sewing needles, pliers and other embroidery supplies.

loans.name: Anar

texts.en:
Anar is 27 year old, married and has two kids. Anar is an IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) and lives in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. Because of money problems in his family, he couldn't get a higher education and has to work to earn money for family. They are living in hard conditions because of that. He is working every day without rest.

Anar breeds sheep and has five years of experience in this field. He gets financial support from the government, but 200 AZN is too small an amount to cover the family’s needs. Sheep breeding requires a lot of physical activity and spending most of the time in the open air. Pasturing takes 80% of Anar's time. He usually buys small sheep and calves, raises and fattens them for five to six months, and then resells them for a more profitable price in the livestock bazaar. His monthly income is 200 AZN and this business is the only source of financial income in his family. Anar would like to purchase more sheep and for this purpose, he applied for a loan of 1,200 AZN. He needs this loan to increase his monthly turnover and to cover the needs of his customers. This is going to be his first loan. Please support him.

loans.use: to purchase more sheep

loans.name: Natercia

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Inhambane tem 35 anos e idade, vive maritalmente mãe de 1 filha menor de idade, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém. 
Trabalha como Enfermeira a mais de 6 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2011, pois enfrentando dificuldades para dar continuidade a sua obra solícita um empréstimo para adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, chapas e mais. Este é o seu 6º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende dar continuidade com os seus estudos e garantir o ensino da sua filha até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
This borrower was born in Inhambane and is 35 years old. She is a married mother of one young daughter. She is not responsible for anyone.

She has worked as a nurse for more than six years, earning an income to apply to the household expenses. She started working with Hluvuku in 2011. She is facing difficulties to continue with her construction work, so she is applying for a loan to buy construction materials, such as sand, cement, metal sheets, and more. This is her sixth loan with Hluvuku.

In the future, she plans to continue with her studies and ensure that her daughter can study up until the higher education level.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, and metal sheets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy livestock feed like hay and Napier grass for both the dairy cows and crossbreeds. She hopes this will enable her to get more milk to sell.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería en producción agropecuaria, por medio de su carrera quiere ser una profesional que ayude a las demás personas.
Es un joven muy soñador que quiere salir adelante y mejorar cada día.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de los útiles de su universidad y así seguir estudiando.
texts.en: Francisco is studying agricultural production engineering and through his career he wants to be a professional who helps other people. He is a young man with many dreams of being successful and having every day be better than the prior day. He is asking for this loan to be able to pay his university expenses and in this way continue studying.

loans.use: to pay university expenses.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos está estudiando la carrera de derecho, en el tercer año, sus papas le ayudan en sus estudios, y el comenta que con esfuerzo y sacrificio está saliendo adelante.
Su meta es poder tener su título universitario, y poder ejercer su profesión para poder tener un trabajo digno y ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad y seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Carlos is studying Law and is in his third year.  His parents help him with his education, and he says that with hard work and sacrifice, he is getting ahead. 
Carlos's goal is to have a university degree and to be able to practice his profession.  Then he will be able to have a dignified means of work and be able to help his family. 
Carlos is asking for this loan to pay his university fees and continue studying, as he is doing now.

loans.use: to pay for university fees.

loans.name: Celsa

texts.es:
Celsa es una persona de recursos limitados, se desempeña como peluquera en un salón de belleza, su deseo es montar su propia peluquería y aumentar sus ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Ella está siguiendo el curso de peluquería para poder capacitarse más y dar a sus clientes un buen servicio.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la cuota de su curso y seguir con sus estudios
texts.en:
Celsa is a person with limited resources. She works as a hairstylist in a beauty salon. Her desire is to open her own hair salon and increase her income so she can improve her standard of living.

Celsa is taking a hair styling course for further training and to provide a good service to her clients.

She is asking for this loan to invest in fees for her course and continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay fees for a hair-styling course.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.en:
Sabina 31 years old is married to Joseph and supports a family of 4 members. 

She has been practicing small scale farming for the last 10 years earning an income of KES 14,000. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting.

She plans to use the anticipated profits to educate her children and expand her farming. 

Her future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting so as to educate her children

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en:
Godfrey, a father of six children, is married, 47 years of age and living in Hoima, Uganda.

He operates a retail shop mainly selling general merchandise, salt, and sugar, among other items, supplemented by income from farming mostly sugar. He started his business in order to raise income for his family's support.

Godfrey likes seeing himself with a stable income-generating business, however, stiff competition poses him a big threat. Godfrey is seeking a loan to buy more stock like soap, sugar and salt for selling.

loans.use: to buy more stock like soap, sugar and salt for selling

loans.name: Sreyleak

texts.en:
Sreyleak is from Banteay Chmar, a village in the North-West of Cambodia. She is 21 years old and lives in a wooden house with her young husband, her parents, and her sister. Her family owns 2 hectares of cassava field, 2 hectares of rice field, and 8 pigs.

In 2012 she was trained by Soieries du Mékong, a social enterprise which fights against rural exodus and for the empowerment of women by training them and offering them sustainable work in the village. Sreyleak makes scarves which are sold in Cambodia and Europe. She uses her weaving income to pay for the family's expenses, fertilizer for the fields, and food for the pigs.

Thanks to the loan, she will buy silk and pay for the dyeing and preparation of the loom. Please support her so she can keep making beautiful, traditional handwoven scarves!

loans.use: pay for loom preparation fees and silk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy milk containers as well dairy feeds to increase production and meet clients' needs.

loans.name: Rosa Mistica Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Rosa Mistica tiene 20 integrantes, están dentro del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas están poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder mejorar sus condiciones y la de sus seres queridos.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Monica, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel  dos, lo que quiere decir que está en un nivel medio de ingresos. Ella se dedica  a la venta de prendas variadas de todo tipo, y gracias a que tiene muy buena variedad siempre tiene muy buenas ventas y tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de prendas variadas para la venta, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar cada
texts.en:
The group called “Rosa Mistica” (Mystic Rose) has 20 members who are in the women’s communal bank program where they are all putting forth their best efforts to be able to improve their conditions and those of their loved ones.

One of the members is Monica, who was at a poverty level of two in her last survey, which means that she is at an average income level.  She makes a living selling assorted articles of clothing of all types.  Thanks to the fact that she has a very good assortment she always has very good sales and has the means to be able to help her family.

She is requesting this loan for the purchase of assorted articles of clothing to sell and thus to be able to continue with her sales and meet the demands of her customers.  She is grateful for this opportunity that she is receiving to be able to improve.

loans.use: to purchase assorted articles of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es de la ciudad de Encarnación, está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, ella quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas en algo tan importante como la salud de otros.
Ella está poniendo todo de sí para poder cumplir con su ideal. Ella pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, ya que quiere cubrir ese gasto que tiene.
texts.en:
Maria is from Encarnación city. She is studying nursing. She wants to be able to help others in something so important as healthcare. She is putting her all into being able to do her best.

She is asking for this loan to be able to pay her university payments and in this way continue studying as she wants cover this expense.

loans.use: to pay university expenses.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
Nilda está estudiando la licenciatura en ciencias de la educación, quiere poder apoyar a las demás personas que al igual que ella quiere salir adelante y ser alguien en la vida.
Está poniendo todo lo mejor de sí para poder cumplir con sus metas. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y seguir con sus estudios.
Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Nilda is studying for a degree in Learning Sciences.  She wants to be able to help other people as much as she wants to get ahead herself and to be somebody in this life. 
Nilda is putting her best self forward to meet her goals.  She is requesting this loan to be able to pay the fees for her degree and continue her education. 
Nilda is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay for university fees.

loans.name: James

texts.es:
James vive en casa propia de material rústico con su cónyuge y sus cuatro menores hijos, tiene 33 años de edad y cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales en su comunidad, la misma que está ubicada en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú, los pobladores se dedican básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

La actividad a la que se dedica James es la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de piña, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha, esto lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto, esto le generará ingresos mayores que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
James lives in his own home made from rustic materials with his wife and four minor children. He is 33 years-old and has very good personal and work references from his community.  This community is located in the Pucará district, in the Jaén province of the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Perú.  

The population mainly works in agriculture, livestock and business.

James works in agriculture, specifically in growing pineapples. He has about 10 years of experience. The loan he will be granted will be used for farming work, the application and incorporation of pesticides, fertilizer and labor for his harvest. This will help him to improve his crops’ appearance, structure and productivity and ensure a successful harvest.  

Consequently he will have better production and a higher quality product, and will have no trouble selling it.  This will give him a better income, improving his family’s and his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in farming, application and incorporation of pesticides, fertilizers and labor for his harvest.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
Elena tiene 47 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad dedicada a la agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de vacas y a la venta de la leche que estas producen, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 02 años por lo que cuenta con clientela fija que brinda muy buenas referencias de ella. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de vacas así como alimento para estas, esto le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones a su ganado lo que le permitirá incrementar su nivel de ingresos y va a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Elena is 47 years old, in a common-law relationship, and lives in her own home with her two children in a rural zone in the district of Oyotún, a community dedicated to agriculture and livestock located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

She works raising cows and selling the milk they produce. She has worked in this business for the last two years and has regular customers who provide very good references for her. She requests a loan to buy a greater quantity of cows and feed for the cows. This will help her have better conditions for her cattle, which will allow her to increase her level of income, and she will improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of cows and feed for the cows.

loans.name: Tito

texts.es:
Tito tiene 47 años de edad, vive junto a su conviviente, tiene 2 hijos dependientes, vive en casa propia en el distrito de Querocotillo, provincia de Cutervo, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

La actividad que realiza Tito es el cultivo de maíz, desde hace 15 años en el caserío de Chaupe, Tito requiere del crédito para invertir en las labores de mantenimiento de su cultivo de maíz, pues desea invertir en la compra de insumos para suministrar a su cultivo. Con esta inversión logrará incrementar sus rendimientos y con ello lograr mejores ganancias. Tito posee experiencia en el negocio por lo que se espera será una gran cosecha.
texts.en:
Tito is 47 years old and lives with his spouse and 2 dependent children in their own home in the Querocotillo district, Cutervo province, in the Cajamarca region of the northern mountains of Peru. His community works mainly in agriculture, livestock and commerce. 

Tito has worked for 15 years growing corn in the hamlet of Chaupe. Tito needs a loan to pay for labor to maintain his corn crop, and to buy supplies for his crop. With this investment he will be able to increase his yield, and earn more income. Tito has experience in this business, so he hopes to have a good harvest.

loans.use: to pay for labor and supplies to maintain his corn crop.

loans.name: Bernard

texts.en:
Bernard is a 47-year-old hardworking married man with four children aged 8, 14, 19 and 20 years old, living in Kamwenge Uganda. He sells agricultural produce alongside farming to earn additional income. With this, he has been able to get income to satisfy his family's needs. He hopes to construct a good residential house but his main challenge is price fluctuation of the agricultural produce he deals in.

He is requesting a loan to buy more bags of maize, beans and ground nuts to sell.

loans.use: to buy more bags of maize, beans and ground nuts to sell.

loans.name: Mariana

texts.es:
Mariana tiene más de 34 años de dedicarse a la venta de refrescos, comida y platanitos en las afueras de los colegios. Gracias a este trabajo, y a la ayuda de su esposo, ha sacado adelante a sus 4 hijos. Inició su negocio con préstamos y con el tiempo dejo de depender de ellos.

Sin embargo, solicita un financiamiento a MiCrédito para la compra de frutas, golosinas, granos básicos, gaseosas. Esto le será de ayuda porque podrá ofrecer todos los productos de mayor demanda, en consiguiente sus ingresos aumentaran. Mariana planea solicitar un nuevo  préstamo para remodelar su casa e invertir una parte en su negocio.
texts.en: Mariana has been engaged in selling soft drinks, food, and plantains outside schools for over thirty-four years.  Thanks to this work, and her husband’s help, she has gotten her four children ahead.  She started her business with loans, and with time stopped depending on them.  However, she is requesting a loan from MiCrédito to purchase fruits, sweets, basic grains, and soda.  This will help her because she will be able to offer all the products that are in high demand and, therefore, her income will increase.  Mariana plans to request a new loan to remodel her home, and will also invest a portion in her business

loans.use: to purchase fruits, sweets, basic grains, and soda.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en: Lydia lives in Hoima, Uganda. She is aged 34 and married with five children, four of whom attend school. She operates a hotel alongside farming maize, cassava and g/nuts (ground nuts) in order to raise income to support her family. She hopes to expand her business and also finish her commercial house. She is seeking a loan to buy more raw food like rice and bananas to cook and sell.

loans.use: to buy more raw food like rice and bananas to cook and sell.

loans.name: Abacar

texts.pt:
Nasceu na província de Nampula tem 23 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 1 filho menor de idade, responsabiliza-se pelo seu tio que vive no bairro 25 de Junho.
É proprietário de um estabelecimento comercial de venda de produtos da 1ª necessidade onde o valor que ganha aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Enfrentando dificuldades para erguer a sua residência solicita o seu 1º empréstimo na Hluvuku para adquirir material de construção como cimento, varões, chapas e mais.
Futuramente pretende expandir mais no seu negócio abrindo mais estabelecimentos comerciais. O seu maior desafio é adquirir uma viatura para o transporte da sua mercadoria.
texts.en:
This borrower was born in the province of Nampula. He is 23 years old and a married father of one young child. He is responsible for his uncle, who lives in the "25 de Junho" neighborhood.

He is the owner of a business establishment which sells basic products. He uses the income which he earns for the household expenses.

He is facing difficulties in building his home. He is applying for his first loan from Hluvuku to acquire construction materials such as cement, posts, metal sheets and more. 

In the future, he plans to expand his business more by opening more business properties. His greatest challenge is to acquire a vehicle to transport his merchandise.

loans.use: to buy cement, posts, metal sheets, and more.

loans.name: Reyhan

texts.en:
Reyhan is a 58-year-old IDP (internally displaced person), married with 4 kids, and lives with her family in the Bilasuvar region. She has farmed for 33 years, has gained much experience, and is considered among the best farmers in her village. She sells milk, eggs, crops, and some small business ventures that help her make ends meet.

Reyhan is very passionate about farming and loves cultivating her farm. She wakes up very early to go to her farm to plow. Although she makes profits farming, she has always wanted to increase her income by selling cereal. 

Now she needs a loan to buy cereal because Bilasuvar, one of the populated regions, has a high demand for cereal. This means that Reyhan could increase her profits and satisfy the demand.

Reyhan believes that this loan will be of much help and that she will be able to satisfy the demand for cereal. She also believes that the extra income she earns will enable a permanent change in her life and increase her business.

loans.use: to buy cereal

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase motorcycle spare parts for repairs and maintenance

loans.name: Hương

texts.en:
Mrs. Hương works in agriculture growing industrial crops.

Hương is 33 years old and is married with six children.
She lives and works in Nong Cong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hương's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.
She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Hương faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

With her profit, she hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Cherie Mae

texts.en:
She lives in the town of Talibon, Bohol. Her name is Cherie Mae, a married woman who operates a tricycle (a motorcycle with side car) transportation service. In addition to that, she also raises and sells hogs. She is in need of capital to finance her existing businesses.

She is asking for a loan to buy a tire and purchase a pig and pig supplements. These will boost her hog-raising business. She could then raise and sell quality hogs. Her transportation services will start to improve and cause the augmentation of her earnings.

Cherie Mae is determined to expand both of her sources of income to become more productive.

loans.use: to buy a tire and purchase a pig and pig supplements

loans.name: Adolf

texts.en: Adolf is a 40-year-old married man with three children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has a motorcycle transport business and at the same time does farming which contributes a lot to his total income. He is faced with challenges of limited capital that in the end have caused his business to come to a standstill. Besides that, he is working very hard to make sure he buys a piece of land to construct their family house. Adolf has asked for a loan to plaster his house and cement it.

loans.use: to plaster his house and cement it.

loans.name: Eveketi

texts.en: Eveketi, who lives in Bundibugyo-Uganda, is a hardworking woman dealing in cocoa buying and selling. She got involved in the businesses to earn income and meet increasing family demands. She has a cocoa garden where she gets additional income. She is challenged by bad weather and limited capital that hinders expansion of her cocoa business.  Eveketi has asked for a loan to buy more cocoa seeds for drying and resale to her customers.

loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace lives in Hoima, Uganda. She is a mother of two loving children, aged 4 and 2. One of them attends school. 
Her business is a retail shop mainly buying and selling general merchandise. She supplements the income earned from the retail shop with farming. 

She has a vision of paying school fees for her child and expanding her business into wholesale. Grace will use the loan to buy more plastic cups, plates, buckets and jugs to sell.

loans.use: to buy more plastic cups, plates, buckets and jugs

loans.name: José Rodolfo

texts.es:
José es un hombre trabajador, honesto, perseverante y responsable. Desde muy joven empezó a trabajar como chofer, pero  tras un accidente decidió comenzar a trabajar en la tapicería de muebles, abrió un pequeño taller que poco a poco fue expandiendo gracias a las ganancias que le generaba.  

En la actualidad tiene mucha clientela y por ende los pedidos son cada vez mayores. Por ello, solicita un crédito para comprar algodón sintético, telas, hilos, grapas, materiales que le serán de ayuda para elaborar los muebles. José espera aumentar sus ganancias y continuar ampliando su taller.
texts.en:
José is a hard-working, honest, determined and responsible man.  When he was very young, he started working as a driver.  But after an accident, he decided to start working in furniture upholstery.  He opened a small workshop that, little by little and with the profit he earned, he was able to expand. 

José currently has a large clientele, and he therefore is getting more and more orders.  That is why he is requesting a loan, to purchase synthetic cotton, fabric, thread and staples.  Those are the materials that will help him to make his furniture.  José hopes to increase his profits and continue expanding his workshop.

loans.use: to purchase synthetic cotton, fabric, thread and staples.

loans.name: Pinki

texts.en:
Pinki is a 27-year-old married woman and responsible mother of three children, who are all students. She is living with her husband and children in Alipurduar. She has completed her education up to grade seven.

Her husband is associated with a sewing business. Pinki helps her husband in this business. They make frocks, salwar suits, blouses, petticoats, and other clothing to sell in the local market. They want to make more fashionable clothing to increase their business profit. So, Pinki is asking for a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner) to purchase a new and modern sewing machine that will help them to run their business smoothly and stitch more variety of fashionable clothing.

She is sure that the profit from their business will help them to strengthen her family’s finances and enable her to grow the business to create a secure future for her family.

She thanks BJS and Kiva for this financial help.

loans.use: to purchase a modern sewing machine for their sewing  business.

loans.name: Nên

texts.en:
Mrs. Nên has a retail business selling metals. Nên has been involved in this business for more than ten years.

Nên is 53 years old and is married with four children. She lives and works in Nong Cong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Nên’s first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. The main hardship that Nên faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Nên hopes for her business to do well, for her children to find good jobs, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Tabitha

texts.en:
Tabitha is 49 years old, married, and blessed with two children. She does farming and has been in the farming business for five years now. She also supports six family members.

She will use the loan from VisionFund Kenya to buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer for use on her farm. She hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce to sell. She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children.

Her future hopes are to improve her farming, make more income, and support her family.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer for use on her farm; she hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce to sell.

loans.name: Hotencio

texts.pt:
Nasceu na província da Zambézia tem 44 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 2 filhos menores de idade, responsabiliza-se pelos seus pais que encontram-se em Mucuba.
É docente a mais de 12 anos onde aufere o valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Enfrentando dificuldades para dar continuidade a sua obra de residência solícita um empréstimo para adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, blocos e ferro. Este é o seu 4º empréstimo n a Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende concluir a sua obra de residência e iniciar uma outra obra de construção de um estabelecimento comercial. O seu maior desafio é garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
This borrower was born in the province of Zambézia. He is 44 and a married mother of two young children. He is responsible for his parents, who are in Mucuba.

He has been a teacher for more than twelve years. He uses his income for the household expenses. He is facing difficulties in finishing the construction work on his home. He is applying for a loan to buy construction materials, such as sand, cement, blocks, and iron. This is his fourth loan with Hluvuku. In the future, he plans to finish work on his home and to start construction work on a commercial establishment. His greatest challenge is ensuring that his children are educated up until the higher level.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, blocks, and iron.

loans.name: Jose Antenor

texts.es:
Jose tiene 31 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico junto a su esposa y sus hijos en el distrito de Querocotillo, ubicado en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La comunidad donde vive es una pequeña zona rural donde los habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y crianza de animales principalmente.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café variedad catimore, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 7 años y cuenta con clientes fijos quienes dan muy buenas referencias de el. El préstamo lo utilizará para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para su cultivo así como para el pago de peones para la cosecha del mismo, esta inversión le permitirá generar ingresos mayores con lo cual mejorará su condición de vida.
texts.en:
José, 31, lives with his wife and children in his own home, made of rustic materials.  They live in the Querocotillo district, located in the Cutervo province, in the Cajamarca region in Peru’s northern sierra.   The community where he lives is a small rural area where people are mainly engaged in farming and raising animals.

José is engaged in farming, specifically the cultivation of Catamor coffee.  He has been engaged in this activity for seven years, and has regular customers that give him very good references.  He will use the loan to purchase manure and fertilizer for his crop as well as to pay laborers to harvest it.  This investment will allow him to generate higher income, with which he will improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizer for his crop as well as to pay laborers to harvest it.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis Alberto tiene 49 años de edad, es casado, vive con su esposa en casa propia, en una comunidad grande en la zona urbana de Cayaltí y goza con buenas referencias personales y laborales de parte de sus vecinos. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio, está ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Luis Alberto se dedica a la actividad de reparación y mantenimiento de refrigeradoras, desde hace más de 15 años de antigüedad en el negocio, en su propio domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de repuestos para refrigeradoras para incrementar su negocio, de esta manera el espera hacer crecer más su negocio, obtener más ingresos y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto is 49 years old, married, and lives with his wife in his own home. He lives in a large community in the Cayalti urban area. He has good personal and work references from his neighbors. People in his community work in the areas of agriculture, livestock, and business. This community is located in Cayalti district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

Luis Alberto has had a business repairing and maintaining refrigerators for more than 15 years. His business is located in his home. He seeks a loan to buy parts for refrigerators in order to expand his business, and in this way he hopes to grow his business, obtain more income, and be able to improve the quality of his life.

loans.use: to buy refrigerator parts in order to grow his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more stock of clothes to sell and be able to meet clients' demands, and make more income to support the family.

loans.name: Valentin

texts.es:
Valentin tiene 43 años, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia con su cónyuge y sus hijos en una comunidad habitada por gente respetuosa dedicada a la agricultura y crianza de animales que esta ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte en su vehículo propio en la cual traslada a sus clientes a los caseríos y zonas cercanas, realiza esta actividad desde hace 10 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo será para realizar arreglos y mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que se encuentra en mal estado, con esto el espera mejorar el servicio que brinda lo que mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Valentin is 43 years old, with a common-law wife, and shares his home with his partner and children in a community where people are respectful and work in the areas of agriculture, livestock, and business. This community is located in Cayalti district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

He provides transportation service in his vehicle, transferring people from residential and nearby zones. He has had this business for 10 years and taught himself this business. He has good personal and work references from the area. The loan will be used to make repairs and maintain his vehicle as it is in poor condition. He hopes to improve the service he provides which will result in an improved quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to make repairs and maintain his vehicle as it is in poor condition.

loans.name: Dionisio

texts.es:
Dionisio tiene 60 años de edad, vive en casa de material rústico con su cónyuge y su nieto en el distrito de Colasay, provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Los pobladores de esta comunidad se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería principalmente.

El se dedica al cultivo de café, cuenta con 30 años de experiencia en este negocio por lo que es muy conocido por la labor que realiza y tiene clientes fijos que dan buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El préstamo lo va a utilizar para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo de café, con esto el espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir obtener ingresos mayores y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Dionisio, 60, lives in a house built of rustic materials with his wife and his grandson in the Colasay district of the province of Jaén, in the Cajamarca region of the northern highlands of Peru.  The residents of this community work mainly in agriculture, commerce, and ranching.

Dionisio earns a living growing coffee.  He has 30 years of experience in this business, and he's very well known for his work.  He has steady customers who give him good personal and professional references.

He's going to use the loan to buy soil amendments and fertilizer to take care of his coffee crop.  With this he hopes to offer his customers a better product, which will allow him to earn more income and, as a result, improve his quality of life and his family's.

loans.use: to buy soil amendments and fertilizer to take care of his coffee crop

loans.name: Elver

texts.es:
Elver tiene 29 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en el distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén, región Cajamaca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte público, cuenta con una mototaxi propia con la cual brinda este servicio, cuenta con más de 04 años de experiencia en el rubro, por lo que cuenta con clientela fija, además el también se dedica a realizar labores agrícola como peón en los diferentes cultivos de su distrito. El préstamo lo utilizará en realizar arreglos y mantenimiento a su mototaxi ya que se encuentra en mal estado, con esto el espera mejorar los servicio que brinda lo que incrementará su nivel de ingresos y por ende va a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Elver is 29 years old and lives in his own home with his spouse and their two children in the Pomahuaca district, Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. The settlers of this district work in agriculture and livestock.

He works providing public transportation service. He has his own motorcycle taxi, which he uses to provide this service. He has over four years of experience in the field and has regular customers. He also works carrying out agricultural work as a laborer in the different crops of his district. He will use the loan to fix and maintain his motorcycle taxi, since it is in poor condition. With this, he hopes to improve the services he provides, which will increase his level of income, and consequently he will improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to fix and maintain his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more bicycle spare parts to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy coffee and maize to sell

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a cattle trader who is aged 34 years, married, with no children and living in Kiryandongo, Uganda. He buys cows, fattens them, and sells them after some time, along with milk selling, to supplement his income. He dreams of exploring all the available markets for cattle and modernizing his farm for higher yields. James is a hardworking man whose efforts are hindered by the long drought coupled with price fluctuations of cattle according to the seasons. James will use the loan to buy more cows to fatten and sell.

loans.use: to buy more cows to fatten and sell.

loans.name: Alfredo Cesar

texts.es:
Alfredo siempre se ha caracterizado por su amor hacia los animales, por eso decidió estudiar para ser médico veterinario, ya que de esta forma podría satisfacer sus interés y aportar al bienestar de la naturaleza. Él está en cuatro año de su carrera, a un paso de convertirse en egresado. 

Sin embargo, solicita un financiamiento para la compra de una computadora, pues con esta herramienta tecnológica le será más fácil realizar sus trabajos académicos. Alfredo espera terminar con éxitos su carrera y abrir una clínica veterinaria.
texts.en:
Alfredo has always been known for his love of animals.  That is why he decided to go to school to become a veterinarian; he will be able to satisfy his interests and work to aid the natural world.  Alfredo is the fourth year of his degree, one step from becoming a graduate. 
Nevertheless, Alfredo is requesting financing to purchase a computer.  With just such a technological tool, it will be easier for him to get his school work done.  Alfredo hopes to successfully finish his studies and open a veterinary clinic.

loans.use: to purchase a computer.

loans.name: Shpetim

texts.en:
Shpetim is a married father of three children who are 18, 14 and 10 years old and he is 51 years old himself. 

Shpetim, or ‘rescue’ in  English, wants to prepare the land for planting beans and medicinal plants with half of the loan and with the rest he wants to add some inventory stock to a little village store he operates from his yard.  For 24 years, he has been pursuing his agriculture activity and for 18 years he has been operating the store. All in all, he owned only 3 dynym (1,000 square meters) and lately he has rented from some villagers about 8 dynym. “The land I owned was not enough to do anything so that I could make an income. This is why I made a little space in the front yard for a store and also rented some more dynyms,” said Shpetim to the loan officer who visited him at his home. 

Seen in the background of the photograph are some primitive warm beds where they plant seeds to become seedlings to be planted outside when the weather permits it.

loans.use: to prepare the land for planting beans and medicinal plants

loans.name: Sagrado Corazon De Jesus Group

texts.es:
Este grupo está dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, son 18 mujeres trabajadoras que se unieron para poder ayudarse las unas a las otras.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Felicia, quien se dedica a la venta de comidas varias que ella misma hace, gracias a la buena mano que tiene con las comidas ha ido creciendo y mejorando. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora que lucha para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para hacer sus comidas, como ser verduras, carne, pollo, hortalizas y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe.
texts.en:
This group is part of a program to eliminate poverty. These 18 hard-working women have united to be able to help one another. 
One of the members is Felicia, who works selling various meals that she makes, thanks to the way that she has with the meals that she has created and improved. She is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman who strives to improve her family's living conditions. 
She is requesting this loan to be able to buy foods to make her meals, such as vegetables, beef, chicken, greens and others. In this manner she will be able to continue working as she has been. 
She is grateful for this opportunity that she has received.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, beef, chicken, greens and other foods to be able to make meals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy mirrors, furniture, chairs, and other items to start her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John, who is married with six children, is a resident of Hoima, Uganda. He is charged with a responsibility of providing his children with all the basic needs, and three of them attend school.

He deals in buying and selling produce, accompanied by farming for supplementary income. He is requesting a loan to buy more produce of beans and maize for selling.

He has a vision of boosting his business to full capacity by stocking his store, only to be challenged by high transport costs due to the poor road network.

loans.use: to buy more produce of beans and maize for selling.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase farm inputs and farm implements for his farming activity to get better produce for family use and for sale in the market.

loans.name: Rong

texts.en:
Rong is a 33-year-old mother of three children, one of whom is in school, while the other two are yet too young to attend. Living in Kampong Cham province, she grows rice on two hectares of farmland and works in construction, earning about 41,700KHR per day. 

Rong lacks the funds to buy more farmland, so she is requesting a loan via VisionFund to fulfill her needs. She hopes to gain greater yields and improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is a 29-year-old married man with 4 children, living in Fort Portal, Uganda.

He deals in motorcycle transport and at the same time has a butchery that adds more income. He is faced with challenges of weather changes that make roads impassible and increase his motorcycle repair expenses. Besides that, he has hopes of diversifying his business to include agriculture.

Julius has asked for a loan to construct his permanent house.

loans.use: to construct his permanent house

loans.name: Sokhon

texts.en: Sokhon, 33, is a mother of three children. Two of them are in school while the other one is too young to attend school. They are living in Kampong Cham province. Nowadays, her family’s living depends on growing cassava on three hectares of farmland and she can earn about 50,000 KHR per day. Due to not having enough funds to do the farming, she is now taking a Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy pesticide and pay the plowing and labor fees. She hopes her crops will grow well and produce a better yield than last year.

loans.use: to buy pesticide and pay plowing and labor fees

loans.name: Mariam's Group

texts.fr: Mariam qui se trouve étant a gauche de la photo avec la daba sur l’épaule, est membre d’un groupe de 10 agriculteurs inscrits à myAgro, vivant et travaillant dans le village de Kimi au sud-est de Bamako au Mali. Mariam, âgée de 50 ans, est la mère de 7 enfants âgés de 12 à 22 ans, dont 5 d’entre eux sont actuellement scolarisés. L’ancrage de la tradition familiale dans la pratique agricole, source principale de revenu et de l’autosuffisance alimentaire du foyer a incité Mariam à exercer cette activité depuis maintenant 40 ans. Elle a exprimé, "Nous faisons l'agriculture pour faire vivre les enfants." Mariam cultive l'arachide, le mais, l'haricot  sur sa parcelle mais doit faire face en tant qu’agricultrice à des difficultés telles que le manque de matériels agricoles. Mariam entame sa première année avec myAgro, et s'est inscrite en raison de la perspective de pouvoir augmenter son rendement à travers les services proposés par myAgro. Cette année Mariam effectue des paiements pour acheter un paquet myAgro de semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide afin d’augmenter ses rendements sur sa parcelle de 0.0625 hectare. Cela fait maintenant 15 ans que Mariam cultive l'arachide pour sa valeur vivrière, expliquant que l’arachide est directement consommable par la famille et est utilisée comme sauce de base dans l’alimentation et aussi pour sa valeur commerciale, car l’arachide est un aliment qu’elle vend sur le marché. Mariam planifie avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu  de faire de l'élevage de moutons. Enfin Mariam espère aussi pouvoir acheter les matériels agricoles.
texts.en:
Mariam is at the left in the photo holding a daba on her shoulder. She is a member of a group of 10 farmers who have partnered with myAgro. They live and work in the village of Kimi, southeast of Bamako in Mali. 

Mariam, 50 years old, is a mother to seven children ages 12 to 22, five of them currently in school. Her family's long-standing tradition in farming as the main source of revenue and food self-sufficiency for the household is why Mariam started farming 40 years ago. She explains that they practice agriculture to feed the children.  

Mariam grows groundnuts, maize and beans on her plot, but she face challenges such as the lack of farming equipment. This is her first year with myAgro; she signed up because of the potential to bolster her productivity through the services available. This year, Mariam is buying one myAgro packet of OPV seeds and fertilizers to grow groundnuts and increase the yield on her 0.0625-hectare holding. 

Mariam started growing groundnuts 15 years ago for its value as a staple food because it is directly edible by the family, and it is used as a base sauce in cooking; it is also a profitable crop that she sells at the market.  

Mariam hopes that an increase in productivity and revenue will allow her to start raising sheep. She also expects to be able to buy the equipment that she needs.

loans.use: to buy one packet of OPV seeds and fertilizers to grow groundnuts.

loans.name: Beyoglan

texts.en: Beyoglan is 26 years old and single. He lives with his parents in the Fuzuli region, and they have been IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) for 23 years from Fuzuli city. This is Beyoglan's third loan, and he repaid his previous two loans on time. Beyoglan has a cafe.  Today he needs a loan in the amount of 1,300 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to buy a gas stove, pots and pans, and other necessary things for his business. He says great thanks for the support. In the future he wants to increase the area of his cafe and his monthly income.

loans.use: to buy a gas stove. In the future he wants to increase the area of his cafe and his monthly income.

loans.name: Esterlito

texts.en:
Esterlito goes fishing and sells fish to earn a living. He has been engaged in fishing for more than 20 years. He is a married man with six grown children from Talibon, Bohol. He needs capital  to improve his fishing livelihood.

He decided to take a loan in the amount of 10,000 PHP to buy a pump boat. This would really help to transport his catch and to ease his travel. With this, his fishing livelihood will increase and he will be able to expand his business. Thus, Esterlito will be able to handle his finances and start to save for emergency purposes.

He would like to handle his existing business to improve his livelihood.

loans.use: to buy a pump boat.

loans.name: Ziba

texts.en:
Ziba is 47 years old and married with 2 children. She is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives with her  family in the Bilasuvar region. Ziba has a secondary education and works as a cook in a cafe. She began raising livestock in the year 2008 in search of additional income for her family. Now, thanks to Ziba's hard work, her farm has 8 cows and 10 sheep. 

In order to further expand her farm and increase her well-being, Ziba has approached Aqroinvest CU  for a loan of 1,200 AZN  to buy 2 cows and 5 sheep to increase the size of her herd. She plans to use the proceeds from her loan to further add to her number of livestock.

loans.use: to buy 2 cows and 5 sheep.

loans.name: Amos

texts.en: Amos used the previous loan to buy bananas for making local brew. He is a farmer growing food crops like bananas and onions, and at the same time, he sells milk. He is faced with the challenge of little capital which hinders expansion of his business. However, he is working very hard to increase his family's income and educate all his children to higher levels of learning. Amos has applied for a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Pauline

texts.en:
Pauline is 22 years old, married, and she supports two family members. She has been a farmer for the last year.
 
She will use the loan to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers and maize seeds for planting so as to get a better harvest to sell. She hopes this will enable her to make more profits to support her family.

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and provide for the needs of her family.  Her future hope is to expand her farming by growing more cash crops and becoming a large-scale farmer.

loans.use: To purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers and maize seeds for planting so as to get a better harvest to sell and to make more profits to support her family.

loans.name: Leonard

texts.en:
Leonard is a very hardworking married man who lives in Hoima, Uganda. He started his business of selling clothes, alongside farming cassava and sugar, in order to raise income to support his family.

He desires to expand and develop his business. However, inadequate capital hinders the achievement of his desires. He is seeking a loan facility to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy dairy feeds for her dairy cows and hopes that this will enable her to get more milk produce to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer for use on her farm. She hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce to sell.

loans.name: Oliver

texts.en: Oliver used the previous loan to pay school fees for her children. She is a retailer, and at the same time sells drugs and grows matooke to provide her with extra income. She is faced with the challenge of defaulters in her business which affects her profits. However, she is looking forward to educating all her children at good schools. Oliver needs a loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Herbert

texts.en: Herbert is a 45-year-old hardworking man with 4 children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has a business of growing bananas and at the same time rears pigs. He faces a challenge of inadequate capital which hinders the progress of his business. However, he hopes to educate all his children to university. Harbert needs a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy coffee to sell.

loans.name: Yen

texts.en: Yen lives in a rural area of the Kampong Cham province. She is 32 years old and a mother of a small child. Cassava farming on 1.5 hectares of farmland and growing rice on two hectares are the sources of her family’s income for the past ten years. This earns her about 36,400 KHR per day. Due to lack of funds, she has decided to take a new loan from VisionFund Cambodia to buy seeds and fertilizer and to pay for plowing. She hopes to earn more income and create a new business, growing cashews.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer and to pay for plowing.

loans.name: Suchean

texts.en: Suchean is from Banteay Chmar, a village in the northwest of Cambodia. She is 26 years old and lives in a wooden pile house with her husband and her 2 young children. Her family owns 3 hectares of rice field, 8 pigs and a half hectare of cassava field. In 2005, she was trained by Soieries du Mékong, a social enterprise which fights against rural exodus and for empowerment of women by training them and offering them sustainable work in the village. Suchean makes scarves which are sold in Cambodia and Europe. She uses her weaving income to pay for her  family's expenses, to buy diesel and fertilizer for her fields, to buy food for the pigs, and to develop the small business she has. Thanks to the loan, she will buy the silk and pay for the dyeing and preparation of the loom. Please support her so she can keep making beautiful traditional hand woven scarves!

loans.use: to pay for the silk and the loom preparation fees.

loans.name: Phen

texts.en:
Phen, 44, is a mother of four children (only one of them is in school) living in Kampong Cham province.

Nowadays, she grows rice to earn money to support her family of twenty-four years. Working as a construction worker is an additional source of her family’s income and she can earn about 41,700 KHR per day through these businesses. Due to lack of funds, she is now applying for a new loan via VisionFund to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farming.

She hopes to earn more income and expand her current business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Sovann

texts.en:
Sovann is from Banteay Chmar, a village in the North-West of Cambodia. She is 29 years old. She lives in a wooden house with one floor with her husband, her 4-year-old son, and her sister, who is studying in high school. Her family owns 6 hectares of rice fields and 2.5 hectares of cassava fields.

In 2002 she was trained by Soieries du Mékong, a social enterprise which fights against rural exodus and for the empowerment of women by training them and offering them sustainable work in the village. Sovann makes scarves which are sold in Cambodia and Europe. This loan is her third one this year. By weaving sometimes 7 days a week, she earns a good salary that allows her to pay for her family expenses.

Thanks to the loan, she will buy the silk and pay for the dyeing and preparation of the loom. Please support her so she can keep making beautiful, traditional handwoven scarves!

loans.use: to buy silk and pay for loom-related fees.

loans.name: Koemsoeurn

texts.en: Koemsoeurn is a rural villager living in Kampong Cham province. She is 51 years old and a mother of two dependent children. To earn money to support her family, she grows rice and has worked as a factory worker for 33 years. Since the factory and her field are a bit far from her house and she does not have enough money to buy a motorbike, she decided to request a Kiva loan via VisionFund Cambodia to fulfill her needs. She hopes to improve her family’s standard of living and make it easier to go to work.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Barjam

texts.en:
Bajram currently has two cows and wants to add two more to the herd with your loan!

Bajram is in his early fifties and is a married father of two. His children are 16 and 13 years old. Their family lives in the rural southeastern part of the country. He’s been doing agriculture for about nine years and livestock for nearly four years. He doesn’t own much agricultural land where he could plant in large quantities grains, beans, potatoes and onions like almost everyone in his village. He only has three dynym land and rents from others roughly 10 dynym where he plants wheat in 3 dynym, fodder in 5 dynym, corn in 4 dynym and beans in 1 dynym. Bujar sells only dried beans out of all the produce and also raw milk to dairy farms. The two cows that he wants to add will add about $12/day to the additional 30 liters/day of raw milk.

loans.use: to add two milk cows.

loans.name: La Esperanza 2 Group

texts.es:
